content: दस्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दस्यति पांसून् दस्-रक्] Savage, fierce, destructive. --स्रौ ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>du.</ab>) {@--1@} The two Aśvins, the physicians of the gods. {@--2@} The number ‘two’. --स्रः {@--1@} An ass. {@--2@} A robber. --स्रं {@--1@} The cold season. {@--2@} The lunar mansion Aśvinī.
